OOC:  Lol, you sound stupid when you say "I got no problem there".  I mean,
this is beast wars, people.  No DBZSF or any other animes/shows/whatever,
and well, crazy characters in this RPG are just really stupid and
annoying..........
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 23, 2001 4:09 PM
Subject: Re: Gorzo/Back at the base


OOC: Good news. I have a friend (Cloudxxx@...) who's going to be
joining us soon. I told him about the sight and he liked it when he
looked at it. He wants to have a char associated with Shadow Star (I
got no problems there), and I think I can get him to add 1 more char
to the Geotrons(we're agreed on that name right). Also could you try
to hurry up the formalities with Gorzo before I get banned for not
interacting lol (that was a joke don't e-mail me about it) no
pressure though. Oh and by the way Nemisis I warned him not to talk to
you so don't waste your time responding to anything he posts.

Mustex finishes the framework and goes to help Stallex with the
submarine.
